## Options

| Option | Description | Required | Default |
| :----- | :---------- | :------- | :------ |
| id     | Video ID    | Yes      | - -     |

## Example

<!-- embed ignore begin -->

```text
{% embed youtube id="EngW7tLk6R8" %}
```
